concept.title: Execute test suite collections in
concept.shortdesc: This guide shows you how to configure, perform, and schedule your test suite collections in .

conbody.p: You can execute a test suite collection in sequential or parallel mode. The behaviors of these two modes are described as follows.

section.title: Sequential mode
section.p: The sequential mode allows you to execute the test suites one after another.

section.title: Parallel mode
